title: Shaylyn Romney Garrett: "The Upswing"
description: Shaylyn Romney Garrett, co-author (with Robert Putnam) of "The Upswing: How America Came Together a Century Ago and How We Can Do It Again." Original air date 24 August 2022. The book was published on 13 October 2020.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (shaylyn romney garrett, michael smerconish)
